a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Based on the expert estimates and index by V-Dem. It combines information on voting rights, the freedom and
fairness of elections, freedoms of association and expression, as well as the extent to which citizens can
engage in regional and local government, civil society organizations, and direct democracy. It ranges from 0 to
